edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.task

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.task.Note

  • public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a note for a task item and includes the note text and author.
    Author:
    Steven Mayo

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note(java.lang.String author,
            java.lang.String text)
        Constructor for a Note object. Each note must have an author and non-null/non-empty text content.
        Parameters:
        author - Author of the note.
        text - The note's content.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the author or text parameters are empty or null.
